channel.title: Rds on Indalit Cloud Consulting
channel.description: Recent content in Rds on Indalit Cloud Consulting

item.title: AWS RDS Multi Availability Zone Deployment
item.description: Did you know with an Amazone RDS Multi-AZ deployment, the standby cannot be used for read or write operations?

item.title: AWS RDS Database Read Replicas
item.description: Did you know that with Amazon RDS you can create Read Replicas from an another Read Replica and have the replication handled between them? This reduces the load on the master.
